name: DIN
description: DIN is a decentralized B2B service discovery marketplace, enhancing the performance, reliability, and cost-effectiveness of dapp development through a network of 50+ Web3 Infrastructure providers. DIN is capable of serving 14+ popular blockchain network APIs and RPCs with high throughput and performance with no single point of failure. DIN is currently in a federated phase, progressively decentralizing traffic across Infura and MetaMask.

operatorSets.name: routers
operatorSets.description: Operator set for routers

software.name: DIN routing services
software.description: Routing and request distribution services for DIN network (under development)

operatorSets.name: watchers
operatorSets.description: Operator set for watchers (responsible for approving qualifications and initiating slashing)

software.name: DIN monitoring and qualification services
software.description: Monitoring, qualification approval, and slashing initiation services for DIN network (under development)

operatorSets.name: arbitrum-mainnet-archive
operatorSets.description: Operators in this set provide archive node access for Arbitrum mainnet, enabling RPC queries and optionally historical state queries
slashingConditions: Serving RPC data from incorrect network/chain
